title: GenAI Invoke Agent Span
description: Captures properties related to GenAI Agent Execution Spans.

xdm:name.description: The name of the operation being performed.
The Generative AI provider as identified by the client or server instrumentation.

xdm:system.description: The Generative AI product as identified by the client or server instrumentation.

xdm:description.description: Free-form description of the GenAI agent provided by the application.

xdm:id.description: The unique identifier of the GenAI agent.

xdm:name.description: Human-readable name of the GenAI agent provided by the application.

xdm:id.description: The unique identifier for a conversation (session, thread), used to store and correlate messages within this conversation.

xdm:messages.description: The chat history provided to the model as an input.

xdm:type.description: Represents the content type requested by the client.

xdm:messages.description: Messages returned by the model where each message represents a specific model response (choice, candidate)

xdm:count.description: The target number of candidate completions to return.

xdm:model.description: The name of the GenAI model a request is being made to.

xdm:seed.description: Requests with same seed value more likely to return same result.

xdm:frequency_penalty.description: The frequency penalty setting for the GenAI request.

xdm:max_tokens.description: The maximum number of tokens the model generates for a request.

xdm:presence_penalty.description: The presence penalty setting for the GenAI request.

xdm:stop_sequences.description: List of sequences that the model will use to stop generating further tokens.

xdm:temperature.description: The temperature setting for the GenAI request.

xdm:top_p.description: The top_p sampling setting for the GenAI request.

xdm:finish_reasons.description: Array of reasons the model stopped generating tokens, corresponding to each generation received.

xdm:id.description: The unique identifier for the completion.

xdm:model.description: The name of the model that generated the response.

xdm:input_tokens.description: The number of tokens used in the GenAI input (prompt).

xdm:output_tokens.description: The number of tokens used in the GenAI response (completion).

xdm:system_instructions.description: The system message or instructions provided to the GenAI model separately from the chat history.

xdm:type.description: Describes a class of error the operation ended with.
